1:
Live on the good side, the bright side, the true side of everything!
Christian D. Larson
2: Be the change you wish to see in the world... -Gandhi
3: Falling down is part of life. Getting back up is living. -Thomas Payne
4: If you have to ask how much they cost, you can't AFFORD one. -JP Morgan
5: You make a living by what you get; you make a life by what you give. -Winston Churchill
6: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our Light not our Darkness, that most frightens us. -Nelson Mandela
7: There's a sucker born every minute. -PT Barnum
8: Well behaved women rarely make history. -Marilyn Monroe
9: I'm a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it. -Thomas Jefferson
10: Ladies and Gentlemen of the class of 99, wear sunscreen. -Kurt Vonnegut
